content.text: Hey there, what are you into?
Hey! I am into music, though my dog, Socks, doesn't seem to care.
I like music too! What's your favorite band?
I like a lot of different bands, but I like the Beatles the best.
Me too! I love the Beatles. I used to listen to them with my mom when I was growing up.
That's awesome! I remember the smell of my mom's cooking and the sound of my dad's laughter when I listened to the Beatles.
That's a really nice memory. I'm glad you have that.
So what do you do for fun?
I like to go for walks with my dog, Socks. I also like to play video games and watch movies.
Cool! I like to go for walks too. I also like to read and play video games.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a lot of different types of books, but I especially like historical fiction and fantasy novels.
Nice! I like to read a lot of different types of books too, but I especially like mystery novels and science fiction novels.
Cool! We should trade book recommendations sometime.
